general.name: id
general.desc: Stable, unique product ID. Alphanumeric with . _ - only; ≤ 100 chars.

general.name: title
general.desc: Product title as merchandised. Aim ≤ 150 chars; avoid ALL CAPS.

general.name: description
general.desc: Plain-text product description. No HTML; ≤ 5,000 chars.

general.name: link
general.desc: Canonical product URL (https).

general.name: image_link
general.desc: Main product image URL (https). Show the single product clearly.

general.name: availability
general.desc: in_stock | out_of_stock | preorder | backorder.

general.name: price
general.desc: Price as '<amount> <ISO4217>' (e.g., '15.00 USD').

general.name: brand
general.desc: Required if GTIN is missing. Combine with mpn.

general.name: mpn
general.desc: Required with brand if GTIN is missing.

general.name: availability_date
general.desc: Required when availability=preorder. ISO 8601 date.

general.name: gtin
general.desc: GS1 GTIN with valid checksum (EAN-13/UPC-A/GTIN-14/…).

general.name: google_product_category
general.desc: Google taxonomy ID or full path (e.g., 187 or 'Apparel & Accessories > Clothing').

general.name: condition
general.desc: new | refurbished | used.

general.name: sale_price
general.desc: Promotional price '<amount> <ISO4217>' (must be ≤ price).

general.name: sale_price_effective_date
general.desc: Date/time window for sale price (ISO 8601 or 'YYYY-MM-DD / YYYY-MM-DD').

general.name: additional_image_link
general.desc: Extra images; comma or pipe separated list of URLs.

general.name: mobile_link
general.desc: Mobile-optimized product URL (https) if different from link.

general.name: unit_pricing_measure
general.desc: Net content for unit pricing, e.g., '100 ml', '1 kg'.

general.name: unit_pricing_base_measure
general.desc: Reference measure for unit pricing, e.g., '100 ml'.

general.name: identifier_exists
general.desc: true/false. Set false only when brand+mpn+gtin genuinely unavailable.

general.name: shipping
general.desc: Overrides for shipping charges; e.g., 'US:Standard:5.00 USD'. Account-level settings may also apply.

general.name: tax
general.desc: US tax rules when not handled at account level (e.g., 'US:MI:6.0').

general.name: multipack
general.desc: Number of identical products in the multipack (integer ≥ 2).

general.name: adult
general.desc: true/false. Mark adult-oriented items appropriately.

general.name: material
general.desc: Material or composition (e.g., 'Stainless steel').

general.name: pattern
general.desc: Pattern or graphic (e.g., 'Striped').

apparel.name: title
apparel.desc: Variant title. Include key attributes (color/fit) when helpful.

apparel.name: description
apparel.desc: Plain-text description of the variant. No HTML.

apparel.name: item_group_id
apparel.desc: Groups color/size variants under one parent.

apparel.name: brand
apparel.desc: Required if GTIN is missing. Combine with mpn.

apparel.name: mpn
apparel.desc: Required with brand if GTIN is missing.

apparel.name: gtin
apparel.desc: Variant-level GTIN with valid GS1 checksum.

apparel.name: google_product_category
apparel.desc: GMC taxonomy ID or path (e.g., 1604 or 'Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Shirts').

apparel.name: size_system
apparel.desc: Sizing system: US, UK, EU, DE, FR, JP, …

apparel.name: additional_image_link
apparel.desc: Extra angles or on-model images; comma/pipe separated URLs.

apparel.name: sale_price_effective_date
apparel.desc: When sale price applies (ISO 8601 or date range).

local_inventory.name: store_code
local_inventory.desc: GMC store code matching your Business Profile location.

local_inventory.name: id
local_inventory.desc: Product ID (must match the primary feed’s id).

local_inventory.name: sale_price_effective_date
local_inventory.desc: ISO date/time or date range when sale applies.
